meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal sound intensity.
meanings.sent1: The isochime on the map shows where the sound is equally loud.
meanings.sent2: We followed the isochime to find the area with the same sound level.
meanings.sent3: The isochime on the map made it easy to locate the noisy spots.
meanings.sent4: The isochime acted like a musical score, guiding us to the areas of equal sound intensity.
meanings.sent5: The isochime painted a clear picture of the sound distribution across the map.

meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal temperature.
meanings.sent1: The isochime helped us identify where the temperature was the same.
meanings.sent2: Following the isochime led us to the region with consistent temperature.
meanings.sent3: The isochime on the map made it look like a color-coded puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The isochime was like a thread stitching together areas of equal temperature.
meanings.sent5: The isochime painted a vivid picture of the temperature distribution on the map.
